title: AFK in Ranked
body: If someone goes AFK can we make it so you dont lose LP cause its pretty dumb that you lose LP cause somebody went AFK

replies.body: 7 games of ranked in a row ive had afkers..... ive been demoted from s3-s5 because its not possible to out match a team in a 4v5 comp. how is this fair like riot needs to fix this right now cause im almost at the point of not playing league, cause its just not fun anymore

What if there was a system so you could join a game where someone had gone afk and allowed you to replace that player and if you win you get bonus points.

Despite all the (but people would bully others into afking, wahhh it wouldn't work) stuff, i agree with this, its stupid that i should lose 23 LP for a loss that occurred because someone went Supp jayce and trolled, and LeBlanc was afk. Then i have a neck and neck battle with even kills and deaths on both sides, almost everyone full build, nearing on 50 mins and win and only get 13 LP, wtf is with that system??

1st problem, "people would afk at the end so they wouldn't lose LP"

Solution, if you are afk when the game ends or for over 6 min you lose the usual amount of LP for that match, AND half of all of your teammates lost LP and your teammates then only lose half of the LP they usually would, (they still lost so they should lose some) 

2nd problem, "people would bully others into AFKing so they didn't lose any LP"

Solution, the AFKer loses far too much LP for someone to just talk them into it, plus we have no tribunal, so any "thresh AFK or we will all report you" threats wouldnt work, as there is no punishment for reports, and apart from reports what else can a bully do? add you to friends and sent you nasty messages? no.

3rd problem, "my system failed and i was AFK for over 6 min but i came back!" 

Solution, while i sympathise with this, if you are afk in ranked, leaver buster is so brutally harsh right now that losing extra LP is the LEAST of your worries, you should be worrying instead about your 3 week ban. 

so yea i see no problems in at least trialling a system similar to this.

Reguarding to the people bullying part, I think that the people should not provoke the person to afk, but at the same time, the person afk shouldn't take enough offense to actually go afk. Think that as long as the game detects disconnected players, it should count as a loss prevented.
